players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "'I believe we should focus on identifying the mafia among us. Since Bob was killed last night, it's important that we work together to prevent any further damage.'..."
Diana: "'I agree with Alice. Let's all share any information we have that might help us identify the mafia and protect our team.'"

You: "I believe we need to keep the focus on identifying the mafia among us. Last night, Charlie was revealed as the mafioso. Let's use this information wisely and work together to ensure their identity doesn't put our team in danger again."

Diana: "'Based on the information we have, it's clear that one of us is the mafia. Let's continue to share any clues or suspicions we may have to help narrow down the possibilities and protect our team.'"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
